com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial

Class DynamicTutorialActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.activity.DynamicSystemActivity
        • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.DynamicTutorialActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, DynamicListener, DynamicLocale

    public abstract class DynamicTutorialActivity
extends DynamicSystemActivity
    Base activity with a view pager to show the supplied tutorials.

    Extend this activity and supply tutorials or dataSet by using the provided methods.

      • onDynamicChange

        public void onDynamicChange(boolean context,
                            boolean recreate)
        Description copied from interface: DynamicListener
        This method will be called when the dynamic change event occurs (like theme, locale, etc.).

        Re-create the activity or application here to adapt changes.

        Specified by:
        onDynamicChange in interface DynamicListener
        Overrides:
        onDynamicChange in class DynamicSystemActivity
        Parameters:
        context - true if there is a context change and it must be reinitialized.
        recreate - true if listener must be recreated to adapt the changes.
